GarethMod:GreenHaze.NAME: Green Haze
GarethMod:GreenHaze.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! garethmod:Virus to all enemies. NL Exhaust.

GarethMod:SwiftBreath.NAME: Swift Breath
GarethMod:SwiftBreath.DESCRIPTION: Startup: Gain !M! garethmod:Nimble. NL Gain !B! Temporary_HP. NL (Scales as Block.)

GarethMod:Debilitation.NAME: Debilitation
GarethMod:Debilitation.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !GarethMod:SecondMagic! Poison to an enemy.

GarethMod:CreateWeakness.NAME: Create Weakness
GarethMod:CreateWeakness.DESCRIPTION: If you target an enemy that intends to attack, it loses !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

GarethMod:XBlocks.NAME: X Blocks
GarethMod:XBlocks.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! Temporary_HP X times. NL Exhaust.

GarethMod:VenomBarrier.NAME: Venom Barrier
GarethMod:VenomBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply 4 Poison to the attacker.

GarethMod:MotionBlur.NAME: Motion Blur
GarethMod:MotionBlur.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn. NL Exhaust.
GarethMod:MotionBlur.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next two turns. NL Exhaust.

GarethMod:ShortHop.NAME: Short Hop
GarethMod:ShortHop.DESCRIPTION: Your Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.
GarethMod:ShortHop.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your Block is not removed at the start of your next turn. NL Gain !B! Block.

GarethMod:SpikeShield.NAME: Spike Shield
GarethMod:SpikeShield.DESCRIPTION: Also costs !M! Block to use. NL Gain 3 Thorns.

GarethMod:MetalDetox.NAME: Metal Detox
GarethMod:MetalDetox.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Costs !M! Block to use. NL Remove Weak, Frail and Vulnerable from yourself.

GarethMod:HonorableDuel.NAME: Honorable Duel
GarethMod:HonorableDuel.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Vulnerable and 1 Frail to yourself. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Set the cost of cards in your hand to 0 this turn. NL Purge.

GarethMod:ChangeOfPlans.NAME: Change of Plans
GarethMod:ChangeOfPlans.DESCRIPTION: Swap your Strength and Dexterity amount.

GarethMod:IndomitableSpirit.NAME: Indomitable Spirit
GarethMod:IndomitableSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you would gain Weak, Frail or Vulnerable, negate it and gain 3 Block next turn.
GarethMod:IndomitableSpirit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you would gain Weak, Frail or Vulnerable, negate it and gain 3 Block next turn.
